User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; de; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: Testopia 2.4

Calling Product.check_category fails with a fatal error.



Reproducible: Always




Undef to trick_taint at Bugzilla/Util.pm
                        line 64
                        	Bugzilla::Util::trick_taint('undef') called at /loader/0x9330704/Bugzilla/Extension/Testopia/Category.pm line 167
                        	Bugzilla::Extension::Testopia::Category::check_case_category('HASH(0x9b7a474)') called at /loader/0x9330704/Bugzilla/Extension/Testopia/WebService/Product.pm
                        line 87
                        	Bugzilla::Extension::Testopia::WebService::Product::check_category('Bugzilla::Extension::Testopia::WebService::Product',
                        'HASH(0x9b7a474)') called at /usr/local/share/perl/5.8.8/SOAP/Lite.pm line 2744
                        	eval {...} called at /usr/local/share/perl/5.8.8/SOAP/Lite.pm line 2729
                        	eval {...} called at /usr/local/share/perl/5.8.8/SOAP/Lite.pm line 2695
                        	SOAP::Server::handle('Bugzilla::WebService::Server::XMLRPC=HASH(0x99fdf18)', '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><methodCall><methodName...')
                        called at /usr/local/share/perl/5.8.8/SOAP/Transport/HTTP.pm line 394
                        	SOAP::Transport::HTTP::Server::handle('Bugzilla::WebService::Server::XMLRPC=HASH(0x99fdf18)') called at /usr/local/share/perl/5.8.8/SOAP/Transport/HTTP.pm
                        line 515
                        	SOAP::Transport::HTTP::CGI::handle('Bugzilla::WebService::Server::XMLRPC=HASH(0x99fdf18)') called at /var/www/bugzilla/xmlrpc.cgi
                        line 48

comments.text:
Created attachment 508351
Patch for extensions/Testopia/lib/WebService/Product.pm

Product.check_category passes wrong arguments to Category.check_case_category
comments.author: nuabaranda@web.de
comments.raw_text: Product.check_category passes wrong arguments to Category.check_case_category
